text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: ――I'll be returning this.

Lunch break. Surprised, 
I accepted the book she handed me.

I lent this to her 3 days ago. This was a book meant 
for trainers, so the material should be quite difficult……

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Considering how difficult it was to read, the 
content is rather lacking. It was useful for 
finding out what theories are current overseas though.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
So, where's the original source for this book? Since it's you, 
you probably have several different versions, don't you?
choice_data_list: That bookshelf. Both translated and original

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Ara, how wonderful. 
Then, I'll be borrowing the original

text_block_list.name: Trainer Colleague
text_block_list.text:
――Oh man～. I've had to study alot more lately. 
I just want to be able to help the girl I'm responsible for.

Lunch break. While eating lunch, 
I was talking with a colleague……

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Good day. 
Do you have a moment?

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
The book I borrowed from you before……right here. 
This part you highlighted with a marker.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
It's quite a useful theory. Especially, in regards 
to the current challenges I need to overcome.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
However, you still haven't implemented them yet……why is that? 
Of course, you'll explain it to me, right?

text_block_list.name: Trainer Colleague
text_block_list.text:
N-no way……I'd heard she was quite intelligent, but like that!? 
It's also amazing that you weren't even fazed by that……Eeeh～!?
choice_data_list: I'm just desperate to not fall behind
I'm just desperate to not fall behind

text_block_list.text:
Gentildonna's intelligence could give a trainer 
a run for their money. Generally speaking, the 
days spent with her were going well, but……

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
………It doesn't look like anyone else is around. 
Where's your smartphone?

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: Unfortunately, it's still with my uniform.

Well, I suppose that's how it should be. We only 
came to clean up after all. Nobody would think that 
someone in a hurry might accidentally lock us in.
choice_data_list: Maybe we should force it open…… But――

text_block_list.text:
If we weren't careful, someone could get hurt though. 
In times like these, it was better to stay calm.
choice_data_list: Let's just wait for someone to come
Let's just wait for someone to come

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Well, I suppose so. It's just the two of us. 
It's probably better not to waste energy.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
And at worst, we'd be here until 7PM. At that time, most 
people should be finishing up their training for the day.
choice_data_list: Right. An hour and a half at worst――
Right. An hour and a half at worst――

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: But, I'd rather not wait that long.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: Hmmph!
(BANG!)

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Huu……Right after finishing training, 
I'd like to take a shower, you know.

The door opened. Without using anything other 
than her breath!? It was almost like the door 
wasn't even locked in the first place……

The lock was neatly broken apart. 
……I'd have to properly explain the damage……
choice_data_list: That had a lot of power……
That had a lot of power……

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: I'll tell you one thing.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
In a world where the number of cards in your 
hand matters, the most useful and effective 
cards sometimes overturn all theory and common sense.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
And that is――『Power』. 
The ultimate Joker.

I couldn't help but think……the way things were, 
she had something in her hand that I didn't.

With a sudden thought, I bent down to reach for the 
iron ball that she had tossed aside so lightly 
――But, I couldn't pick it up. I could barely lift it.

I guess that was to be expected. Even among 
Uma Musume she was outside the norm. There 
was no way I could do the same as her……But――

There's no way that was a good thing. 
――In that moment, my pride as a trainer wouldn't back down!
choice_data_list: I want……to be as powerful as you!
I want……to be as powerful as you!

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: ……Ara, well, well. Ho ho ho――

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: Quite the commendable spirit.
